Articles.Content: Hello guys, i wanna know if there is any mod that allow me to have custom Categories at the Tracking Station. Because after 20 ou 30 probes thinks start to get messy and you can't understand the map. So i wold be nice to have a way to put my comsats all in the same group and hide them. If there is no mod that allow me to do that, there is anyone who can help me to build one?

I'd like something like this too but I've seen some posts that indicated that the categories are hardcoded and can't be changed/added to (in a reasonable manner). I'm hoping someone will prove this wrong but I'm not holding my breath.
A good suggestion would be at least one new category - communications satellite. With the new comm-sat stuff coming after 1.1, it'll become quite useful.
